body:
<GESTURE 
    onswipeleft="" 
    onswiperight="" 
    onswipeup="" 
    onswipedown="" 
    onclick=""
    onrightclick=""
    onlongpress=""
    ondoubletap=""
    >
    <BOX height="300" width="300" center="true" color="amber">
        <ICON icon="swipe" size="190" />
    </BOX>
</GESTURE>
GESTURE [FML].description: A Gesture snippet, remove any gestures that are not required
